column4: Anyone have good luck with SIS 760 vid chipsets when running Dapper LiveCD?  It freezes a while, then dumps me to a blank screen after 'configuring some drivers...ok' with blinking cursor.
Hi Gang.  Could someone tell me how to boot into 'text mode' when using the LiveCD ?  I'm having video issues and need to get things going without X first.....
same problem. same question
:D
yes, I thought someone might remember me <g>
Failed to start x server?
no i dont remember you. i have the same problem with an nvidia gf2 card
I get as far as    'configuring some drivers...ok' which then dumps me to a blank screen with blinking cursor.
yeah and after the blinking cursor?
ah, understood.  SiS 760 on-board here....
after?  Nothing.  Sits there....indefinitely....
hmm.. i have got an error message too.. then sits there
:D
do you know how to reach the live-expert ?
because i have found everywhere this solution
I tried the amd64.iso as well (AMD Athlon 64 arch here) and it dies too, but with some error16 notes about segfaults.
but if i put it in the boot prompt it wont work
i have tried the desktop i386 iso
i have 32 bit system
but i cannot understand what the hell can be the problem...
anyone?:)

have you tried specifying just the number '3' as your boot option ?  That may (or may not?) take you to run level 3, without X.  It'll want you to log in though...not sure what the def user/pass would be....trying that now myself
